short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Maximize your Basecamp efficiency right from Chrome with Can Do.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Can Do for Chrome is the must-have extension for all Basecamp users looking to enhance their project management experience. Seamlessly integrated into your Chrome browser, the Can Do extension enables:

Quick Card Creation: Create cards without logging into Basecamp. In addition, you can easily add a url and due date.

Favorites Tab: Effortlessly mark anything inside Basecamp as a favorite for quick access. Simply click the heart icon from any screen and easily reference it from your new favorites tab.

Can Do does even more - it offers the ability to mass archive messages, projects, cards, and completed to-dos. Broadcast messages across multiple projects, mass-create to-dos, cards, and markers in your lineup. Plus, effortlessly create Zoom meetings directly from any chat.

Become a Pro Basecamp user with Can do.
